title: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When choosing SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, a beep sound is heard. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also produces the same beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not produce a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. Clicking on buttons should not trigger the beep sound as well.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the ControlExampleText section. 
2. Choose SWT.MULTI option. 
3. Observe the beep sound. 
4. Click on other buttons and notice the beep sound.
